resources.string: Defense News and Washington D.C. CBS affiliate WUSA 9 created a weekly TV program called This Week in Defense News with Vago Muradian, which first aired on March 2, 2008. The show centers on international defense and military issues. It initially aired on ABC 7 WJLA and the Armed Forces Network. On April 3, 2017, Sightline Media Group announced the show would move to WETA-TV and be called Defense News Weekly. Tony Lombardo, executive editor of Defense Newsâ€™ partner brand, Military Times, was announced as the show's co-host with Jill Aitoro.
